QuestData.Title: Blessing of Zim'Rhuk
QuestData.CompletionText: <Zim'Rhuk is impressed and frustrated that once more you seem to have dodged his guardians. At least for now.>$B$B<Place the offerings before him and he will grant you his blessing again.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Zim'Rhuk forces an image into your mind of one of his guardians squishing you beneath its foot. Perhaps you should attempt to appease Zim'Rhuk with more offerings.>
